name: Atlassian Statuspage
description: Integrate with Atlassian Statuspage to list, create, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Incidents
tools.description: List incidents from the Statuspage. Returns incident names, statuses, and impact levels.

tools.name: Create Incident
tools.description: Create a new incident on the Statuspage. Provide a name, status, and optional impact and component IDs.

tools.name: Update Incident
tools.description: Update an existing Statuspage incident. Can change status, add an update message, or modify impact.

tools.name: List Components
tools.description: List components on the Statuspage. Returns component names, statuses, and descriptions.

tools.name: Update Component
tools.description: Update a component on the Statuspage. Typically used to change the operational status of a component.

pageId.label: Page ID
pageId.description: Your Statuspage page ID (found in your Statuspage dashboard settings)
